title: Portfolio ver. 1.0
description: The first iteration of my portfolio. Created with React and Sass, hosted by ZEIT

title: Spotify React
description: Practicing my React skills by creating a Spotify web clone. Just like the web player it provides features such as playing and finding music. It also includes new features like displaying your recent top tracks and artist.

title: Amiibo Collector
description: Keep track of your collection with the Amiibo Collector. Created with React, Redux, Firebase and Typescript.
